[Page Title: Community - The Wine Bar]

Community

We love supporting our Charleston community. Below you will find just a few of the local causes that we support!
Belle Hall Elementary School Toys For Tots Charleston Make a Wish South Carolina Junior League of Charleston

[Page Title: Charcuterie - The Wine Bar]

Charcuterie

All selections served with toasted baguette, honey, Dijon mustard, olives, cornichons, and assorted fruit and nuts.
Soft Cheeses 
St. Andre – Organic cow’s milk, buttery, creamyBrie – Triple cream, cow’s milkWild Mushroom Brie – Buttery, earthy, triple cream, exotic mushroomsGorgonzola – Creamed blue cheese

Semi-Soft Cheeses

Dill Havarti – Creamy cow’s milk, infused with dill & herbsJalapeño Havarti – Havarti with a light jalapeño flavorButterkase – Silky, buttery, nuttyPort Derby – English derby cheese infused with Port wineRed Dragon – Soft Cheddar with British ale & whole grain mustard

Semi-Firm Cheeses

Aged Asiago – Sweet & salty with grassy notesRosemary Asiago – Infused with Rosemary, nutty notesChipotle Gouda – Smokey, light spice, full of flavor5 Year Aged Gouda – Flavorful, rich and creamySmoked Gouda – Creamy Gouda finished with a smokey flavor5 Year Reserve Cheddar – Sharp white cheddar, tangy, saltyHorseradish Cheddar – Aged white Cheddar, infused with tangy horseradishSmoked Cheddar – Beechwood smoked Wisconsin CheddarTruffled Goat – Flecked with black truffle shavings & spicesBlueberry Goat – Creamy goat cheese covered in sweet & tangy blueberriesManchego – Unpasteurized sheep’s milk, nutty notes

Firm Cheeses

Caramella – Rich with hints of Parmesan & caramelBlack Pepper Parmesan – Aged 24 months, black pepper crustedParmesan Grande Pedano – Classic, nutty notesTruffled Pecorino – Crumbly, earthy, truffle-infused

Meats

Italian Dry Salami – Traditional hard salami with garlic & Italian herbsPinot Grigio Hard Salami – Dry-aged salami infused with Pinot GrigioSweet Soppressata – Spiced, hard Salami infused with Burgundy wineHot Soppressata* – Robust pork sausage with garlic, spices, peppercornsBlack Pepper Salami – Bold, black pepper encrustedCapicola –  Italian cured pork shoulderPicante Coppa* – Capicola rubbed with hot Italian spicesAbruzzo Picante* – Abruzzo area, Old-World sausage, herbed & spicedPepperoni – Traditional Italian favoriteChorizo* – Spanish spicy sausagePate – Truffle chicken mousseProsciutto – Italian cured pork, salty & sweetSweet Tavern Ham – Sweet, Beechwood-smoked ham

[Page Title: Home - The Wine Bar]

The Wine Bar
Open Monday – Saturday 4pm-12am Happy Hour Daily from 4-6pm Wine List Contact Us " 
The Wine Bar
Open Monday – Saturday 4pm-12am Happy Hour Daily from 4-6pm Wine List " 
Welcome to

The Wine Bar

Welcome to The Wine Bar
Happy Hour – Daily specials from 4-6pm 1/2 Off Wine Wednesday every week! 
Join us for a glass or choose a bottle to take home from our retail section. Choose from a small plate, charcuterie platter, or indulge in one of our decadent desserts. There is ALWAYS something happening at The Wine Bar!

us for details.
We would love to host your next event! Dates fill up quickly, so email 
For 2026, we are introducing our ! Join for exclusive access to Reserve Tier wines and monthly members-only events!
Wine Club 
Find us in the Belle Hall Shopping Center:
664 Long Point Rd. Unit G Mount Pleasant, SC 29464 
Discover The Wine Bar
Check out what our favorite Charleston DJ, Brooke Ryan, had to say about The Wine Bar in her podcast about things she loves! Charleston friends, you can listen to Brooke on the Two Girls and a Guy show weekdays from 5am – 10am on Mix 95.9 
·
Two Girls and a Guy 2GG Podcast: 3 Things Brooke Loves 4 20 2023 
Bites

Bites

CHARCUTERIE

All selections are served with toasted baguette, honey, Dijon mustard, olives, cornichons,
and assorted fruit and nuts. 
MEATS & CHEESES

We offer a
unique variety of 60 + artisan cheeses and charcuterie meats from around the world. 
HOUSE-MADE DIPS

Choose from five different house-made dips, served with sliced, toasted baguette. Gluten free crackers also available.

SMALL PLATES

From Brie en Croute to Stuffed Mushrooms to Escargot, choose from seven different small plates to please every palate.

FLATBREADS

From our classic Quattro Formaggi to our decadent Prosciutto Flatbread, we’ve got something for vegetarians and meat-eaters alike.

DESSERTS

Try our delicious mousse flight or mini cheesecakes. Craving chocolate? We’ve got you covered with our fudge plate and  homemade bark.

Private Events

Private Events

We would love to host your next event:
Holiday Parties Corporate Events Bridal Showers Birthdays We can host a special event for any occasion! us for details. Email Event Gallery The Wine Bar To Go! 
Hosting an event at your home? Let us do the work! We would love to provide a customized charcuterie tray and any other small plates that you require. We also have a large selection of wines for sale.
Reviews of The Wine Bar 
“”
Great place to enjoy both in or out of doors. 
““
The presentation was beautiful and it was all delicious. We really enjoyed our visit to the Wine Bar and are looking forward to returning. – FinGin79 
“”
Loved it! 
“O“
ne of the most enjoyable meals we had this vacation long weekend! Service was friendly and relaxed. – JV G 
“”
Don’t miss out!! 
““
Cozy, relaxing and the food & wine are equally as amazing!! – Bridget B 
“Really Enjoyable!”

“
Great atmosphere, extensive wine list, wonderful appetizers, charcuterie and cheeses and chocolates. “ – Jmsi1956 
Read More Reviews
Hours MON – SATURDAY 4:00pm – 12:00am Happy Hour 4-6 Daily Kitchen Open Until 11PM Nightly Great late-night option for food! CLOSED ON SUNDAY 
Drop Us A Line

We would love to hear from you. Let us know if you have any questions!
Contact Us Find Us

[Page Title: Wine Club - The Wine Bar]

Join The Wine Club

2026 brings the launch of our monthly Wine Club! Details of each Reserve Tier are below. Space is filling up fast, so  us today to join!
email Reserve Member 
$45/month + tax includes:

(2) Select “Reserve” bottles

Member discount to purchase more

All-inclusive, members-only party with a guest

Last Sunday of each month

Tasting of monthly bottles

Food pairings

25% off any menu bottles*+

15% off The Wine Bar merchandise+

Sign On Bonus:

(1) Wine Bar Wine Key

(1) Wine Bar Koozie

(1) Wine Bar Drip Stop

*Allocated bottles excluded*

+Day of pick up only+
Grand Reserve Member 
$90/month + tax includes:

(2) Select “Grand Reserve” bottles

Member discount to purchase more

All-inclusive, members-only party with a guest

Last Sunday of each month

Tasting of monthly bottles

Food pairings

25% off any menu bottles*+

15% off The Wine Bar merchandise+

(1) Wine Bar Wine Key

(1) Wine Bar Koozie

(1) Wine Bar Drip Stop
(2) Etched The Wine Bar Wine Glasses 
*Allocated bottles excluded*

+Day of pick up only+

[Page Title: Book An Event - The Wine Bar]

Book An Event

Please get in touch for a quote to host your next event!
We would love to host your next event! Our space is perfect for birthday parties, company holiday parties, baby showers, happy hours, book launches, and more! Check out our event gallery . Dates fill up quickly, so email . us for details

[Page Title: Bites - The Wine Bar]

Bites
Small Plates 
Fried Mozzarella – 3 large, hand-breaded mozzarella sticks, with marinara or ranch

Goat Cheese & Peppers – Warm goat cheese, roasted red peppers and olives draped over caramelized onions, served with toasted baguette*

Escargot – Helix snails baked with garlic-shallot butter, with toasted baguette*

Brie en Croute – Triple-cream Brie wrapped in puff pastry, toasted, served with assorted jams, honey almonds, toasted baguette*

Garlic Cheese Bread –  Mozzarella cheese stuffed baguette, brushed with garlic butter

Stuffed Mushrooms – mushrooms stuffed with herbed goat & triple-cream cheeses, topped with Port Derby cheese and baked

French Onion Soup – house-made classic soup

Flatbreads

Truffled Woodsman – two truffled cheeses, sliced mushrooms, balsamic drizzle

Quattro Formaggi – mozzarella, aged asiago, port derby cheeses, roasted garlic and olive oil base, topped with Parmesan cheese and balsamic drizzle

Traditional Pepperoni – premium pepperoni, mozzarella, Parmesan, marinara base

The Trilogy – pepperoni, tavern ham, bacon, fresh mozzarella on a marinara base

Prosciutto Flatbread – Fig jam base, topped with sliced Prosciutto, caramelized onions, Gruyere, and goat cheeses

House-Made Dips

(Served with toasted baguette)*

Olive Tapenade – traditional Italian spread

Pimento Cheese – traditional spread with minced jalapeños, served with Ritz crackers

Spinach Artichoke Dip – topped with Parmesan and baked, house-made

Buffalo Chicken Dip – roasted chicken blended with cheeses, ranch, and hot sauce

Oil & Balsamic Vinegar Plate – with black pepper and Parmesan cheese

Desserts

Mousse Flight – trio of homemade mousse with fresh whipped cream

Fudge Plate – two chocolate & two white chocolate (walnuts & cranberries)

Homemade – a la carte. Find our selections
Bark here 
Mini Cheesecake – homemade with biscotti crust & fresh whipped cream

* Gluten-free crackers available upon request at an additional charge
